meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a zany.
meanings.sent1: The clown's zanyish costume made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: Her zanyish sense of humor always brightened the room.
meanings.sent3: The zanyish hat added a playful touch to his outfit.
meanings.sent4: His zanyish antics entertained the children for hours.
meanings.sent5: The zanyish decorations transformed the party into a carnival.

meanings.sent1: The comedian's zanyish performance had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent2: She had a zanyish personality that attracted many friends.
meanings.sent3: His zanyish behavior at the party kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent4: The zanyish jokes he told always brought smiles to people's faces.
meanings.sent5: The zanyish character in the movie brought a sense of fun to the story.

meanings.definition: Tending to behave in a zany manner.
meanings.sent1: The zanyish friend always had crazy ideas for adventures.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her zanyish antics at family gatherings.
meanings.sent3: His zanyish way of dancing never failed to make people laugh.
meanings.sent4: The zanyish group of friends always found joy in the simplest things.
meanings.sent5: The zanyish puppy ran around the yard in pure excitement.
